about_the_game:
Hell Green Blue - is an immersive 2D action-adventure puzzle game that thrusts players into a world dominated by the malevolent red color, symbolizing evil and chaos. In a desperate attempt to save the world from imminent annihilation, a group of courageous heroes embarks on a treacherous journey deep into the dark catacombs of Hell.

FEATURES
  • Unique Color-Based Gameplay: "Hell Green Blue" offers a refreshing twist on traditional action-adventure games by incorporating a color-based gameplay mechanic. Players must shoot colored projectiles in specific sequences to unlock doors, solve puzzles, and defeat guardians.
  • Challenging Puzzle Elements: The game presents players with intricate puzzles and brain-teasing challenges throughout the dark catacombs of Hell. Success requires not only quick reflexes but also strategic thinking and clever use of colors.
  • Intense Boss Battles: Prepare to face terrifying guardians that serve as the formidable bosses of Hell. Each guardian possesses distinct color-manipulating abilities, making every encounter a thrilling and unique showdown.
  • Weapon and Skill Upgrades: As players progress, they collect "Hell Green Blue" essence, which can be used to upgrade their blaster and unlock new skills. These upgrades are crucial for overcoming the increasingly difficult obstacles and foes.
  • Atmospheric Visuals and Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the haunting ambiance of Hell's catacombs through the game's dark and atmospheric visuals. The captivating soundtrack complements the gameplay, intensifying the overall experience.

  • Challenging Puzzle Elements: The game presents players with intricate puzzles and brain-teasing challenges throughout the dark catacombs of Hell. Success requires not only quick reflexes but also strategic thinking and clever use of colors.

name: Hell Green Blue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP\ Vista \ 7 \ 8 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1030
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: "Hell Green Blue" is a 2D action-adventure puzzle game where you must venture into the catacombs of hell armed with a blaster that shoots colored projectiles. Defeat the guardians, improve your skills, and save the world from the dominance of the red color!
